Directions
For the Ginger-Curry Butter:
In a small bowl, stir together crème fraîche, ginger, and curry powder until thoroughly combined. Using a silicone spatula, fold in the butter until well mixed. Season with salt.
For the Miso-Soy Butter:
In a small bowl, stir together crème fraîche, miso, and soy sauce until thoroughly combined. Using a silicone spatula, fold in the butter until well mixed. Season lightly with salt, if needed.
For the Fresh Herb Butter:
In a small bowl, stir together crème fraîche and herbs until thoroughly combined. Using a silicone spatula, fold in the butter until well mixed. Season with salt.
If compound butters are too soft after mixing, refrigerate until slighly more firm but still spreadable, 5-10 minutes. Serve butters with crisp fresh radishes.
